# Description
```{r}
col<-colnames(model$data$long[,-1])
n<-length(col)
dv<-col[n]
iv<-gsub(":", "+", row.names(y))
for(v in iv){
means<-tapply(d[,dv], d[,v], mean)
variance<-tapply(d[,dv], d[,v], var)
#  p<-ggqqplot(d, dv, facet.by = v)+
#   labs(title = v)
cat("Means", sep = "\n")
print(round(means,2))
cat("Variances",sep = "\n")
print(round(variance,2))
}

```

# Wally plots
```{r, message=F}
# wallyplot(model$lm)
qqnorm.wally <- function(x, y, ...) { qqnorm(y, ...) ; abline(a=0, b=1) }
wallyplot(model$lm, FUN=qqnorm.wally, hide = F)
wallyplot(model$lm, FUN = residualplot, hide=F)
```
